author: JBG
title: L’imam Mahjoub Mahjoubi expulsé en quelques heures
text: À peine interpellé, déjà renvoyé en Tunisie… Comment l’imam Mahjoub Mahjoubi, accusé d’incitation à la haine, a-t-il été expulsé aussi vite ? Imam expulsé : "Rapide mais sans surprise" "C’est une expulsion certes rapide, mais sans surprise, estime Samia Maktouf, avocate aux barreaux de Paris et Tunis. Elle est intervenue conformément aux dispositions du Code d’entrée et de séjour des étrangers, modifiées certainement tout récemment par la loi Immigration." "Cette expulsion rapide semble être justifiée par des faits extrêmement graves et répétés. Des prêches de la haine faisant manifestement référence à un lexique et à une idéologie djihadistes, qui ne laissent aucun doute. Il met clairement la loi d’Allah au-dessus de la loi des hommes. Il évoque des gouvernants qui vont chuter, des drapeaux sataniques, sans aucune valeur auprès d’Allah." Imam Mahjoub Mahjoubi : comment a-t-il été expulsé aussi vite ? "La nouvelle loi immigration est venue renforcer le dispositif", explique [@samiamaktouf](avocate aux barreaux de Paris et Tunisie) [#GrandMatin] [https://t.co/A9dvO7eGbA] [pic.twitter.com/t4WzP8jtvJ] — Sud Radio (@SudRadio) [February 23, 2024] Pas besoin de laisser-passer tunisien "Nous avons pu éviter une demande de laisser-passer aux autorités tunisiennes, explique Samia Maktouf, avocate aux barreaux de Paris et Tunis. Elle n’a pas été nécessaire car les forces de police disposaient du passeport de cet imam. La loi rendait possible la visite à son domicile. Pour emprunter un avion et que les forces de l’ordre puissent expulser cette personne comme représentant un danger pour l’ordre public, il fallait cette pièce d’identité." L’avocat de Mahjoub Mahjoubi entendait contester cet arrêté d’expulsion. "Ce recours n’est pas suspensif. C’est sur la base de différents prêches suivis par les services de renseignement qu’il a été renvoyé. Bien sûr, il va invoquer l’article 8 de la Convention européenne des droits de l’homme sur sa vie privée et familiale. Mais ce respect ne peut aller à l’encontre du danger que cette personne représente. Un danger qui semble être manifeste et prouvé." Retrouvez "Sud Radio vous explique" chaque jour à 7h40 dans le Grand Matin Sud Radio avec Patrick Roger. [Cliquez ici pour écouter “Sud Radio vous explique”](https://www.sudradio.fr/programme/le-grand-matin/sud-radio-vous-explique) [Toutes les fréquences de Sud Radio sont ici !](https://www.sudradio.fr/frequences)

author: REDACCIÓN
title: La Guardiamarina, numerosa y novedosa - Faro de Vigo
text: Vela La Guardiamarina, numerosa y novedosa La prueba se presentó en el Náutico vigués y se disputará en dos etapas REDACCIÓN Una vez más, la Regata Guardiamarina, prevista para este fin de semana, cerrará las pruebas por etapas para vela pesada que organiza el Real [Club Náutico](https://www.farodevigo.es/tags/vela-galicia/) de Vigo este año. La Armada, también inmersa en la organización pues la idea nació en 1993 entre la [Escuela Naval Militar de Marín](https://www.farodevigo.es/tags/escuela-naval-de-marin/) y el propio club vigués, buscará el triunfo. La participación es superior a las últimas ediciones. El cierre de inscripciones está fijado este viernes y la flota ya ha alcanzado la veintena de unidades, incluyendo la clase de Clásicos, debutante en la prueba, para barcos con características determinadas y construidos antes de 1990. Pedro Cardona, el comandante de la Escuela Naval, dio muchas posibilidades de victoria para la Marina: “Se prevé escaso viento… y nuestra flota está especialmente preparada con ventolina”, dijo. Por cuestiones logísticas, la Guardiamarina será este año la primera de las dos regatas que la Armada comparte con clubes náuticos de la provincia. En mayo suele ser la Almirante Rodríguez Toubes (Marín-Vilagarcía-Marín), pero se ha trasladado al 5 y 6 de octubre. El Mirfak, de la Comisión Naval de Regatas de Ferrol, ganó para la Armada en 2022, pero el pasado año fue el BON III (Víctor Carrión CN Punta Lagoa) el vencedor. Carrión defenderá cetro. El sábado, regata entre Marín y Vigo (12:30 horas), con la etapa Vigo-Marín para el domingo (11:00). Grímpolas de doce clubes náuticos gallegos intentarán dar réplica a la Armada. A la presentación asistieron el presidente del Náutico, José Antonio Portela; su homólogo de la Federación Gallega, Manuel Villaverde; la delegada territorial de la [Xunta](https://www.farodevigo.es/tags/xunta-de-galicia/), Ana Ortiz; el comandante naval de Vigo, Antonio Couce, y el jefe del Servicio de Deportes de la Xunta, Daniel Benavides. La Armada, con cuatro patrones y veintiséis tripulantes inscritos, presentará tres nuevos barcos, tres J99 recibidos este verano de un astillero mallorquín y bautizados Regulus. También regatearán con el Aldán, un First 40.7 habitual en las regatas gallegas. author: vivette.
title: 750.000 pazienti colpiti dal furto di dati digitali in un istituto sanitario nell'\u00cele-de-France
text:
[France](/tag/France)
Nomi, nomi, date di nascita, medico curante… Secondo un esperto di sicurezza informatica martedì sono stati messi in vendita su Internet i dati di oltre 750.000 persone.
Azienda
Dalla vita quotidiana alle grandi questioni, scopri i temi che compongono la società locale, come la giustizia, l'istruzione, la salute e la famiglia.
[France](/tag/France) Télévisions utilizza il tuo indirizzo email per inviarti la newsletter “Società”. Potrai cancellarti in ogni momento tramite il link in fondo a questa newsletter. La nostra politica sulla privacy
Secondo l'hacker, che ha rivelato online un campione dei dati rubati, il file messo in vendita conterrebbe elementi sensibili: oltre a cognomi, nomi, indirizzi email e postali e date di nascita, informazioni mediche come l'identità di il trattamento o le prescrizioni del medico sarebbero particolarmente preoccupati. Dati personali di 758.912 persone.
“Non possiamo essere sicuri dell’attendibilità di queste cifre.“, ha tuttavia chiarito Damien Bancal, autore anche del blog zataz.com.
Il Ministero della Salute ha confermato di essere stato informato di questo attacco informatico dall'Agenzia sanitaria regionale dell'Île-de-France (ARS).
La proposta di vendita comprendeva il nome di Mediboard, un software medico utilizzato nelle strutture sanitarie, nonché il nome di diversi ospedali privati.
Interrogata dall'AFP, la società Softway Medical, editrice di Mediboard, ha tuttavia precisato che la fuga di notizie non riguardava il software in sé, bensì una struttura sanitaria del gruppo Aléo che lo utilizza. “I dati sanitari della struttura non sono ospitati da Softway Medical“, ha precisato Déborah Draï, responsabile della comunicazione dell'azienda.
Aléo Santé riunisce 14 cliniche o centri sanitari e tre case di riposo a Parigi e nel sud della regione parigina, secondo il suo sito web.
“Le misure legate a questo tipo di incidenti vengono attuate dal gruppo Aléo in collaborazione con le diverse autorità interessate. ha detto il ministero, aggiungendolo “che questo evento non ha alcun impatto sulla continuità delle cure e sulla sicurezza delle cure“.
“Con tutte queste informazioni possiamo creare database sempre più precisi e che sono sicuramente il modo migliore per conoscere la vostra futura vittima per effettuare phishing mirati, magari per effettuare una falsa chiamata in banca.“, ha commentato all'AFP Benoit Grunemwald, esperto di sicurezza informatica presso ESET, azienda specializzata nel settore.
Il gruppo Aléo non ha risposto immediatamente alle richieste dell'AFP.
Nelle ultime settimane diverse aziende sono state vittime di fughe di dati, come l'operatore telefonico Free e la rivista Le Point. Anche Direct Assurance, filiale del gruppo Axa, ha segnalato che 15.000 dei suoi clienti sono stati colpiti da attacchi informatici: sono stati rubati nomi, nomi, indirizzi e-mail, nonché i loro Iban (numero di conto bancario internazionale) per 5.800 in totale. ha detto la società.

author: John Miles
title: Pope Francis Urges Zelensky to Save Lives, Find 'Courage' to End Conflict
text: Pope Francis added his name to the long list of international critics of Volodymyr Zelensky recently in comments urging the Ukrainian president to find the “courage” to negotiate with Russia for an end to the Donbass conflict.The interview, filmed last month by Swiss public broadcaster RSI, took place before recent mediation proposals, including Friday’s from Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan. Erdogan offered to host a summit between Ukraine and Russia, a prospect that’s undermined by a decree issued by Zelensky in late 2022 forbidding negotiations with Russia while the country is led by President Vladimir Putin.The development took place after at least two attempts by Putin to negotiate an end to hostilities early in the conflict. Both rounds of negotiations were scuttled by the United States, which intervened to end separate diplomatic efforts involving then UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson and former Israeli Prime Minister Naftali Bennett in 2022. The US role came to light in media reports emerging shortly after.Pope Francis made clear he believes the best option for Zelensky as well as the Russian and Ukrainian people is for the embattled leader to admit defeat. The Pope made the comment in response to a question by the interviewer, who discussed the possibility of Ukraine raising the “white flag.”Vatican spokesman Matteo Bruni, perhaps perceiving the potential controversy of Pope Francis’ blunt language, noted the Pope picked up on the interviewer’s use of the term “white flag.” Bruni explained the cleric intended “to indicate a stop to hostilities [and] a truce achieved with the courage of negotiations.”“One may feel shame, but how many dead will it [the conflict in the Donbass] end up with?” the Pope asked. “[Zelensky should] negotiate in time, find a country that can be a mediator. Do not be ashamed of negotiating, before things get worse.”The interview likely represents the first time Pope Francis has so openly acknowledged Zelensky’s defeat after 2023’s vaunted Ukrainian counter offensive failed to turn the tide of the conflict. In recent weeks Russian forces have made gains on the battlefield as Zelensky mulls conscripting more Ukrainians to fight, recently liberating the city of Avdeyevka from the Kiev regime.In response to the interviewer’s question if Pope Francis himself would be willing to help mediate negotiations, the Pope reiterated, “I am here.”The cleric also expressed hope for an end to Israel’s military operation in the besieged Gaza Strip, where the official death toll is nearly 31,000. Gazans have begun to die of starvation in recent weeks as Israel strictly limits the amount of food allowed to enter the enclave and Zionist civil society organizations form a blockade of aid delivery.Social media users were horrified this week as photos of 10-year-old Yazan Kafarneh circulated online showing the Palestinian child emaciated and near death. By Monday Kafarneh had passed away, one of many in Gaza who have fallen victim to Israel’s genocidal campaign.“Negotiating is never a surrender,” Pope Francis said, urging an end to the Zionist brutality. https://sputnikglobe.com/20240309/zelensky-rejects-proposed-peace-summit-negotiation-with-russia-1117216966.html https://sputnikglobe.com/20230331/zelensky-must-negotiate-with-russia-not-beg-west-for-more-arms-academic-says-1108990752.html https://sputnikglobe.com/20240310/with-us-backing-israel-is-starving-22-million-palestinians-in-gaza-1117237324.html ukraine russia israel donbass

title: I'm the Admiral and Michael Jordan Dream Team star who lit up NCAA Tournament with historic 50-point performance | talkSPORT
text:
The San Antonio Spurs had to wait two years after drafting David Robinson with the first overall pick in 1987.
He was more than worth the wait.
Long before the Long before the NCAA Tournament was known as March Madness, the 7ft 1in giant laid down an emphatic display that hinted at the Hall of Fame career to follow.
Robinson joined his first organized team as a high school senior after a growth spurt saw him shoot above his classmates.
He kept up basketball after joining the United States Naval Academy in 1983 and four years later put on one of the all-time great NCAA performances.
In the first round of the 1987 tournament against Michigan, Robinson racked up 50 points, 13 rebounds, three steals, two blocks and just one turnover.
It was his fifth consecutive 20-point double-double in the NCAA tournament. Only Zach Edey has more (six).
Despite his heroics, Robsinson's effort would be the final game of his college career after the Wolverines secured a 97-82 victory.
The tournament was famous for being the first to feature a 3-point line -- the future Spurs superstar didn't attempt a single one as he shot 59.5 percent on 37 field goals.
Robinson has also been credited with fuelling the rise in basketball cards, which were not a big deal at the time despite Magic Johnson and Larry Bird's fame.
The All-American served two years in the Navy after San Antonio selected him.
With a 6ft 6in height limit for midshipmen, he worked as a civil engineering officer at the Naval Submarine Base Kings Bay in Georgia to complete his two-year active duty obligation.
While he was later known as the admiral, his actual final rank was lieutenant (junior grade).
As he had not signed a contract with the Spurs, Robinson could have re-entered the draft and speculation was rife he would choose not to join San Antonio.
He eventually signed a contract after the Spurs agreed to match the salaries of the two highest-paid players in the league each year, or release him.
That all added to his mystique and by the time Hoops arrived on the card scene for the 1989-90 season featuring the novel idea of rookie designs, people were clamoring to get their hands on the Admiral. The buzz was a game-changer for the industry.
Robinson certainly lived up to the hype. Spending his whole career in San Antonio, he was named MVP in 1995 and inspired the team to Championships in 1999 and 2003 -- his final season.
A 10-time All-Star led the league in rebounds in 1991, won Defensive Player of the Year a year later, and was the league's scoring leader in 1994 -- he was a big man with an all-round skill set.
March Madness Top Stories
‘This sister is special’ – Stephen A. Smith identifies rising star who can challenge Caitlin Clark’s WNBA dominance
NCAA March Madness is bigger and better than the College Football Playoff - the springtime phenomenon is bigger than ever
Best buzzer beaters in NCAA Tournament history - including Michael Jordan heartbreaker
Biggest March Madness upsets in history of NCAA Tournament - top seeds humiliated as small schools enjoy their moment
Among his collection are two Olympic golds from 1992 -- Michael Jordan's dominant Dream Team -- and 1996.
His first encounter with Air Jordan came in an exhibition game in 1988.
"I go back to meet Michael because, like everybody else, I'm a big fan, and you know the first thing he says to me? 'I'm going to dunk on you, big fella. I dunked on all the other big fellas, and you're next,'" Robinson told Sports Illustrated in 2012.
"And he said it almost every time we played. I'd go back at him, 'Don't even think about it. I will take you out of the air.' And Michael would always promise to get me.
"Eventually [he dunked on me]. It was a two-on-one with him and Scottie. Michael took the shot and I went up to block it, but I didn't get there, and he dunked it and the crowd went crazy. 'Told you I was going to get you one day,' he said. "Man, what a competitor. He never forgot anything, never let you get away with anything."
Robinson entered the Hall of Fame in 2009. From 50 points in an NCAA tournament loss to being put on a poster by Air Jordan, the 59-year-old isn't short of anecdotes as he enjoys his retirement.
How to watch March Madness in the UK
*If you click a link in this box we will earn affiliate revenue
March Madness is one of the most exciting times of the year for basketball fans, with a total of 68 teams battling it out to become the Division 1 college champions.
This year UConn have the chance to become only the second team ever to complete a March Madness three-peat, having emerged victorious for the last two years.
talkSPORT will have the latest news on the tournament, but for UK basketball fans the way to watch is through Sky Sports. The broadcaster will be showing EVERY March Madness game through their Sky Sports + streaming service.
Click here to sign up to a Sky Sports subscription, or read our article on the best Sky Sports deals available now.

author: pooja-sharma-1
title: Love Problem Solution Specialist Astrologer IN USA - Lady Astrologer Pooja Sharma... | Yoomark
text:
Love Problem Solution Specialist Astrologer IN USA - Lady Astrologer Pooja Sharma
Unlocking the Secrets of Love: Expert Astrological Insights for Relationships in USA
Love Problem Solution Specialist Astrologer IN USA As the world's most romantic country, the United States is home to countless couples who are seeking to unlock the secrets of love and make their relationships thrive. But what lies beneath the surface of that romantic glow? The ancient art of astrology holds the key to understanding the complexities of human connection, and with its help, we can gain a deeper insight into the intricacies of love and relationships.
By examining the positions of the stars and planets, we can uncover the hidden patterns and energies that shape our romantic lives. From the passionate and impulsive Fire signs to the calm and analytical Water signs, each astrological sign has its own unique approach to love and relationships. In this post, we'll delve into the expert astrological insights that can help you navigate the ups and downs of love in the USA, and provide you with the tools to make your relationships more fulfilling and enduring.
Introduction to astrology and love
As the universe's vast expanse of stars and planets aligns in a unique and intricate dance, it's no wonder that ancient cultures believed that the celestial bodies held secrets to understanding the mysteries of human connection. Astrology, the ancient art of analyzing the movements of the stars and planets to gain insight into human affairs, has long been fascinated by the intricate web of relationships that bind us together. For those seeking to unlock the secrets of love, astrology offers a profound and nuanced understanding of the cosmic forces that shape our romantic journeys.
In this blog post, we'll delve into the fascinating world of astrology and explore how it can provide expert insights into the complexities of love and relationships. From the ancient Greeks to modern-day astrologers, the concept of astrology has been a cornerstone of understanding the human experience. By examining the positions of the planets and their corresponding influences on our personalities, we can gain a deeper understanding of the hidden forces that shape our romantic connections. Love Problem Solution Specialist Astrologer IN USA
From the fiery passion of Mars to the gentle nurturing of Venus, each planet plays a unique role in shaping our love lives. By examining the astrological signs and their corresponding traits, we can gain valuable insights into the types of relationships that are most likely to succeed, and how to navigate the challenges that inevitably arise. Whether you're seeking to understand the mysteries of your own love life or seeking to improve your romantic relationships, astrology offers a powerful tool for unlocking the secrets of love. In this blog post, we'll explore the ancient art of astrology and its applications in the modern world of relationships.
The zodiac and love compatibility
The ancient art of astrology has long been revered for its uncanny ability to reveal the intricacies of human relationships. One of the most fascinating aspects of astrology is the concept of love compatibility, which examines the energetic dynamics between two individuals and predicts the likelihood of a successful and fulfilling partnership. The zodiac, with its 12 signs and unique characteristics, plays a crucial role in this analysis.
Each zodiac sign is associated with distinct personality traits, strengths, and weaknesses, which can either harmonize or clash with those of their partner. For example, a fire sign like Leo is naturally drawn to adventure and excitement, while a water sign like Cancer is often more emotional and nurturing. When these two signs come together, their contrasting energies can create a dynamic and passionate relationship, but also one that requires careful balance and communication.
The zodiac can also provide insight into the compatibility of couples based on their sun signs, rising signs, and moon signs. By examining the planetary positions at the exact time and location of an individual's birth, astrologers can gain a deeper understanding of their personality, emotional needs, and relationship patterns. This knowledge can help individuals identify potential red flags or areas of compatibility in their relationships, ultimately leading to a more fulfilling and meaningful connection with their partner. Love Problem Solution Specialist Astrologer IN USA
In this section, we'll delve into the intricacies of love compatibility and explore the zodiac signs that make for the most harmonious and fulfilling relationships. We'll also examine the challenges that may arise and provide expert advice on how to navigate these differences and build a stronger, more loving bond. Whether you're seeking guidance on your current relationship or looking to attract a new partner, the ancient wisdom of astrology has the power to reveal the secrets of love and unlock the full potential of your romantic connections.
The role of Venus and Mars in love relationships
When it comes to understanding the intricacies of love and relationships, the celestial bodies of Venus and Mars hold a profound significance. These two planets, often referred to as the "God of Love" and the "God of War" respectively, play a crucial role in shaping our emotional connections and romantic experiences. In the realm of astrology, Venus is associated with the principles of love, beauty, and harmony, while Mars is linked to passion, energy, and desire. The interplay between these two planets in our birth charts can reveal a great deal about our romantic tendencies, the type of love we're drawn to, and the dynamics of our relationships.
When Venus is strong in our chart, we may be naturally inclined towards romantic gestures, a desire for harmony and balance in our relationships, and a deep appreciation for beauty and aesthetics. On the other hand, a strong Mars can indicate a strong libido, a need for excitement and adventure in our relationships, and a tendency to be fiercely protective and passionate about the people we love. Love Problem Solution Specialist Astrologer IN USA
In couple's relationships, the alignment of Venus and Mars can reveal the underlying dynamics of the relationship. For instance, if Venus and Mars are in harmony, the couple may experience a strong and fulfilling connection, marked by mutual respect, trust, and a deep emotional bond. However, if these planets are in conflict, the relationship may be tumultuous, with conflicts arising from differing desires and needs.
Astrological insights can offer a unique perspective on our love lives, helping us understand the underlying patterns and tendencies that shape our romantic experiences. By gaining a deeper understanding of our Venus and Mars energies, we can better navigate our relationships, cultivate more fulfilling connections, and ultimately, unlock the secrets of love.
Understanding the Moon's influence on emotions
As the Moon waxes and wanes, its subtle yet profound effects on our emotional landscape can be felt by people across the United States. The lunar cycle has been a source of fascination and mystery for centuries, and when it comes to relationships, understanding the Moon's influence on our emotions can be a game-changer. The Moon's phases can intensify or alleviate emotions, causing us to feel more irritable, anxious, or affectionate. By tuning in to the Moon's cycles, you can better navigate the ups and downs of your relationships, avoiding unnecessary conflicts and deepening your emotional connection with your partner.
For example, when the Moon is in its full phase, it's common to feel a sense of completion and fulfillment, which can be a great time to plan romantic getaways or special dates with your loved one. Conversely, when the Moon is in its new phase, it's often a time of introspection and rebirth, which can be a great opportunity to reflect on your relationship and identify areas for growth. By being aware of the Moon's cycles, you can work with your partner to create a more harmonious and emotionally intelligent dynamic, fostering a deeper sense of connection and understanding. Love Problem Solution Specialist Astrologer IN USA
Moreover, the Moon's influence on emotions can also be linked to the individual signs of the zodiac, with each sign having a unique relationship with the Moon. By understanding the Moon's role in your personal birth chart, you can gain valuable insights into your emotional patterns and tendencies, allowing you to make more informed decisions in your relationships. Whether you're seeking to improve communication, build trust, or navigate the challenges of long-distance relationships, understanding the Moon's influence on emotions can be a powerful tool for unlocking the secrets of love and achieving a more fulfilling and meaningful connection with your partner.
How to read your birth chart for love insights
Unlocking the secrets of love and relationships can be a mysterious and thrilling journey, especially when guided by the ancient wisdom of astrology. In this section, we'll delve into the realm of birth charts, a powerful tool for gaining insight into your love life and relationships. A birth chart, also known as a natal chart, is a unique map of the celestial bodies at the exact moment of your birth, providing a blueprint of your personality, strengths, and potential. By analyzing your birth chart, you can uncover hidden patterns, energies, and tendencies that may be influencing your romantic relationships.
As you gaze upon your birth chart, you'll notice various symbols, lines, and shapes that represent the positions of the planets, Sun, and Moon at the moment of your birth. The planets, each with its own unique energy and characteristics, will reveal to you aspects of your personality, emotional needs, and love language. The Sun, representing your inner self, will illuminate your desire for autonomy, creativity, and personal growth. The Moon, governing your emotional realm, will reveal your attachment style, emotional needs, and ability to nurture and care for others. The planets' positions in relation to each other will also reveal the dynamics of your relationships, including the potential for harmony, conflict, and growth. Love Problem Solution Specialist Astrologer IN USA
By understanding your birth chart, you can gain valuable insights into your love life, including the types of relationships you're most compatible with, the qualities you seek in a partner, and the potential challenges you may face in your romantic relationships. The importance of Mercury and communication in love
When it comes to navigating the complex and often mystifying world of love, effective communication is often the key to unlocking a deeper connection with our partner. And yet, so many of us struggle to find the right words, or worse, struggle to listen to each other. This is where Mercury, the planet of communication, comes in. As the planet closest to the sun, Mercury is often seen as the messenger of the gods, and in the context of relationships, its influence can be the difference between understanding and miscommunication.
In astrology, Mercury's placement in a person's birth chart can reveal a lot about their communication style, whether they're naturally inclined to be more verbal or more reserved, and even how they process and respond to information. For example, someone with Mercury in a fire sign like Aries or Leo may be more prone to speaking their mind, while someone with Mercury in a water sign like Cancer or Scorpio may be more inclined to listen and empathize. When it comes to relationships, Mercury's influence can be particularly significant. For example, a couple where both partners have Mercury in a harmonious aspect to each other (such as trine or sextile) may experience effortless communication and a deep understanding of each other's needs and desires. On the other hand, a couple where Mercury is in a challenging aspect to each other (such as square or opposition) may struggle to find common ground and may need to work harder to build trust and understanding.
By understanding the role of Mercury in our relationships, we can gain valuable insights into how to improve our communication and build stronger, more meaningful connections with our loved ones. Whether you're looking to improve your communication skills, overcome relationship challenges, or simply deepen your understanding of the mysteries of love, exploring the secrets of Mercury and communication in love can be a powerful tool on your journey to unlocking the secrets of love.
The role of Saturn in testing relationships
As the celestial gatekeeper of karma, Saturn is often referred to as the "Teacher of the Gods" due to its powerful influence on our lives. In the realm of relationships, Saturn's presence can be a game-changer, as it has the ability to test our commitment, trust, and loyalty to one another. This serious and disciplined planet is known to reveal the true nature of our relationships, stripping away any superficialities and revealing the raw, unfiltered reality.
When Saturn is involved in a relationship, it's as if the universe is putting our love to the test. We may encounter challenges that force us to confront our deepest fears and insecurities, and to confront the harsh realities of our own flaws and shortcomings. This can be a daunting and uncomfortable experience, but it's also a transformative one. Love Problem Solution Specialist Astrologer IN USA
Saturn's presence can manifest in various ways, such as through power struggles, communication breakdowns, or even the appearance of external obstacles that threaten to tear the couple apart. However, it's also possible that Saturn's influence can bring about positive changes, such as increased responsibility, maturity, and a deeper sense of commitment and loyalty.
Ultimately, the role of Saturn in testing relationships is a complex and multifaceted one. As we navigate the challenges and opportunities that this planet brings, we're given the chance to refine our relationships, to grow and evolve as individuals, and to emerge stronger and more resilient as a result.
The impact of Jupiter on expansion and growth
As the largest planet in our solar system, Jupiter is often referred to as the "Great Expander" in astrological terms. When it comes to relationships, Jupiter's influence can be particularly profound, as it has the power to amplify our desires for connection, growth, and expansion. When Jupiter is in a favorable position in a person's birth chart, it can bring about a sense of abundance and prosperity in their romantic life, manifesting in the form of new relationships, renewed passion, and a deeper sense of commitment.
In the USA, Jupiter's transit can have a significant impact on the nation's collective psyche, influencing the way people approach love and relationships. During its peak in 2019, Jupiter's influence in the fire sign of Sagittarius sparked a sense of adventure and optimism in the romantic lives of Americans, as many people felt inspired to take risks and pursue new experiences. This energy was especially palpable in the rise of online dating and social media, which allowed individuals to connect with others more easily and explore new possibilities. On the other hand, when Jupiter is in a challenging position, it can also bring about a sense of restlessness and discontentment in relationships. In these cases, couples may need to work harder to maintain their connection and find ways to reignite the spark that once brought them together.
Ultimately, Jupiter's impact on relationships is a powerful reminder of the ever-changing nature of love and the importance of embracing growth and evolution in our romantic lives. By tuning in to Jupiter's energies and staying attuned to its cycles, we can tap into its expansive potential and cultivate more fulfilling, joyful, and meaningful relationships.

author: The Maritime Executive
title: Philippine Navy Spots Swarm of 200 Chinese Vessels at Mischief Reef
text:
The Philippine government has expressed unease at the assembly of a flotilla of 200 Chinese maritime militia trawlers and China Coast Guard vessels at Mischief Reef, a military base that China has constructed inside the Philippine Exclusive Economic Zone.
Mischief Reef is located just 20 nautical miles from Second Thomas Shoal, a Philippine-controlled land feature that is the scene of frequent confrontations between Chinese and Philippine forces. The base at Mischief Reef has been used previously as a supply and staging point for the Chinese government vessels that resist Philippine resupply convoys for the garrison at Second Thomas Shoal.
A spokesman for the Philippine Navy says that about 15 China Coast Guard vessels and another 200-odd maritime militia fishing vessels have been spotted at Mischief Reef. This is an unusually substantial force, though not unprecedented. Chinese militia trawlers have previously swarmed at other flash points in the Spratly Islands, like Reed Bank.
"Every now and then they get deployed all over the South China Sea… At any time, they will be moving, some of them will be anchored, especially the maritime militia, so it is difficult to give you the exact number at an exact point in time," Commodore Roy Vincent Trinidad told a press conference Tuesday.
The Philippine Coast Guard continues to plan resupply missions for the outpost at Second Thomas Shoal. The last delivery mission was conducted by airplane, reflecting the difficulty that China has created for seaborne transport to and from the installation.

author: Megan Camponovo
title: Watch: Videos you may have missed this week
text: Watch: Videos you may have missed this week From a good Samaritan rescuing a pig that was "tossed like a football" along a Mardi Gras parade to a man being rescued two days after driving off a cliff, here are some of the videos you may have missed this week: Good Samaritan rescues pig 'tossed like a football' along Mardi Gras parade route A [piglet](/article/good-samaritan-rescues-pig-along-mardi-gras-parade-route/46963693) that was tossed around on a parade route during Mardi Gras has been rescued. A good Samaritan rescued the young pig after she saw three men tossing it around like a football at a park near the parade route. The pig, who now has a new name of "Piglet," was not hurt during the ordeal, but was very scared. Watch the video in the player above. Man rescued 2 days after driving off Big Sur cliffside in California A California man was [rescued](/article/watch-man-rescued-2-days-after-driving-off-big-sur-cliffside-in-california/60024861) on Tuesday after driving his car off a Big Sur cliffside and falling 400 feet. The man, who crashed while driving home from his job, was first reported missing after not returning home on Sunday night. Wild video shows man climbing Florida cellular tower to livestream on social media According to deputies, the Hillsborough County Sheriff's Office aviation unit was called around 7 p.m. on Feb. 24 after reports that an individual was [climbing a cellular tower](/article/florida-man-climbing-cellular-tower-video/46995065). HCSO said the individual was climbing back down the tower after livestreaming a video to his social media. The aviation team was able to direct ground deputies to the location of the climber. Handcuffed car theft suspect outruns officers in Philadelphia A Philadelphia [car theft suspect](/article/philadelphia-handcuffed-suspect-flees/46976306) who had his hands cuffed behind him fled from two police officers outside a hospital where he had been taken for examination, police said Monday. Puppy spotted along an interstate on-ramp in Boston quickly finds a new home A [young puppy](/article/puppy-found-interstate-on-ramp-rescued/46980204) that was recently found along an on-ramp heading toward Interstate 93 in Boston, Massachusetts, did not take long to find a new place to call home.
